words.source: H3947 conj. + Qal perf. 1cs of לָקַח 'to take'; FOURTH expression of redemption; KJV 'I will take', ESV 'I will take', NASB 'I will take'
prep. l- + 1cs suff.; KJV 'to me', ESV 'as my own', NASB 'for My own'
H5971 prep. l- + n.ms ʿam 'people, nation'; KJV 'for a people', ESV 'people', NASB 'people'
H1961 conj. + Qal perf. 1cs of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'will be to you', ESV 'I will be', NASB 'I will be'
prep. l- + 2mp suff.; KJV 'to you', ESV 'your', NASB 'your'
H430 prep. l- + n.mp ʾelohim 'God'; KJV 'a God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God'
H3045 conj. + Qal perf. 2mp of יָדַע 'to know'; KJV 'ye shall know', ESV 'you shall know', NASB 'you shall know'
H3588 conj. ki 'that, for, because'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H589 pron. 1cs ʾani 'I'; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H430 n.mp ʾelohim 'God' in construct + 2mp suff.; KJV 'your God', ESV 'your God', NASB 'your God'
H3318 def. art. + Hiphil ptc. ms of יָצָא 'to go out; Hiphil: to bring out'; KJV 'which bringeth you out', ESV 'who has brought you out', NASB 'who brought you out'
H8478 prep. min + n.ms tachath 'under, beneath'; KJV 'from under', ESV 'from under', NASB 'from under'
H5450 n.fp sivloth 'burdens, forced labor' in construct; KJV 'the burdens of', ESV 'the burdens of', NASB 'the burdens of'
H4714 proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt'; KJV 'the Egyptians', ESV 'the Egyptians', NASB 'the Egyptians'
